channel.title: NPC and monster help
channel.description: I just got the MoparScape client running and walked around noticed that there weren't really any enemies around. In Varrock all I saw were a few Guards and some rats but that was all. I went to the Wilderness and saw no monsters there. And around towns there we're no NPC's selling items. Is there something I have to download or something I have to run to see/put/add them in?

item.title: NPC and monster help
item.dc:creator: @firefoxyoshi firefoxyoshi
item.description:
@firefoxyoshi wrote:

I’ve added them to the autospawn file but whenever I run the client it just goes black and says Connection Failed and it trys to connect but doesnt do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC and monster help
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

You have to add them in autospawn idiot.

Read full topic
